name: Integrating design teams for best BREEAM buildings: Case study 1 – LICA building
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: It’s important that there is a joined-up approach to sustainable design and that there is a shared vision across professionals from multiple disciplines. Architects, lighting designers, interior designers, landscape architects, structural engineers, clients and developers all need to feed into the design process in a coherent way if buildings are to be as energy efficient and low-carbon as they can be. Getting the brief right at the outset is crucial.

presentations.name: The client’s view point
presentations.speakers: Suzanne Parkinson, Head of Project Delivery, Lancaster University

presentations.name: Achieving a BREEAM Outstanding building: from briefing to occupation
presentations.speakers: James Jones, Associate & Design Director, Sheppard Robson

presentations.name: It’s not what you do, it’s the way that you do it
presentations.speakers: Rachel Brown, M&E Engineer, Morgan Sindall
